attributes.action: Impose trade sanctions on the Myanmar Government
attributes.additional_details: The United Nations has recognised the Atrocities, death and destruction but the Myanmar leader: Aung San Suu Kyi is too weak to challenge the Military or is complicit in the ethnic cleansing
attributes.background: The Myanmar authorities have been engaged in ethnic cleansing and genocide against the Rohingya community for decades. The atrocities,  murder, rape violence against the Rohingya community is leading to displacement, hardship and suffering of a community.
